bdi4jade.annotation

Annotation Type Parameter


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Parameter
    This annotations is used to specify properties that are input, output or both of goals and plan bodies. When a plan body has an annotated input, it is set automatically by the platform by obtaining it from a goal input. When a plan body has an output, it is automatically used to set a goal output.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Parameter.Direction direction
      This attribute indicates the direction of the parameter.
      boolean mandatory
      This attribute indicates if the parameter is mandatory.

    • Element Detail

      • direction

        public abstract Parameter.Direction direction
        This attribute indicates the direction of the parameter. The default value is Parameter.Direction.IN.
        Returns:
        the parameter direction.
        Default:
        bdi4jade.annotation.Parameter.Direction.IN

      • mandatory

        public abstract boolean mandatory
        This attribute indicates if the parameter is mandatory. The default is false.
        Returns:
        true if the parameter is mandatory, false otherwise.
        Default:
        false
